text: Linda Gerritsen (born 12 March 1983) is a German water polo player. She was part of the Germany women's national water polo team at the 2003 World Aquatics Championships, 2005 World Aquatics Championships, 2007 World Aquatics Championships and 2009 World Aquatics Championships. == References == == Other websites == * Linda Gerritsen zimbio * linda-gerritsen-of-germany-holds-the- ball-against-brazil category:1983 births Category:Living people category:German water polo players
title: Linda Gerritsen
